extendedInfo.description: Use our mobile app to search for the library catalog and download ebooks!Log in to your library account to place holds, renew items you have checked out, see what you have on hold, and view other account information.Ask a Librarian a question during Library hours.Check the calendar of events for meetings, story times, and other programs.Get directions and library location on the map and view hours.Connect with us on Facebook, Flickr, Pinterest, and YouTube.
